import * as serviceProduct from "../../service/ServiceProduct"; import React, {useEffect, useState} from "react"; import "./style.css" import {useParams} from "react-router"; import 'bootstrap/dist/css/bootstrap.min.css'; export function DetailProduct() { const param = useParams() const [productDetail, setProductDetail] = useState([]) const [product, setProduct] = useState([]) const findDetailProduct = async () => { const result = await serviceProduct.detailProduct(param.id) setProductDetail(result) } const findAllListProduct = async () => { const result = await serviceProduct.findAllProductDetail() setProduct(result.content) } useEffect(() => { findAllListProduct(); }, []) useEffect(() => { findDetailProduct() }, [param.id]) useEffect(() => { document.title = "Chi tiết sản phẩm "; // Thay đổi title window.scrollTo(0, 0) }, []); if (!productDetail) { return null } return ( <> {/*

Chi tiet

*/}

{productDetail.nameRacing}

{productDetail.note}

Các sản phẩm khác

{ product.map((product) => (

{product.nameRacing}

 {product.price}
)) }
